name: Dungeon Janitor (dasPanjo, LFOB, jvolonte, ViktorRKraus)
description:
Did you ever cleaned up a level after you played it?

No? Well, this is where the dungeon janitor crew is for. They will clean the level, so you can just enjoy the next one.

In dungeon janitor you are one of member of the dungeon member crew. It's your job to clean the level, burn the remains of the evil enemies another player took care of.

Can you beat the clock?

Try cleaning up as fast as you can so you beat the ONLINE highscore. Not only play against your friends and enemies. Play against everyone in the world.

Controls:

A/D - Move left/right
Space - jump
E - Pickup / use
F - Drop
S - Move down wodden platforms
